snippet.title: Steel Seed Developer Presentation Trailer -  Future Games Show Summer Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

Storm in a Teacup founder Carlo Bianchi gave us an in-depth overview of Steel Seed, the studio’s next game. A sci-fi stealth-action platformer set in the wake of a climate catastrophe, Steel Seed is coming soon to PC, PlayStation and Xbox. 

#FutureGamesShow #FGS
